title: what game do i need to play for dropbear of doom?
body: I  put my self in the challenge but i'm{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  not sure what game I play to help out?

replies.body: Also is the challenge only lastin 1 hr and ??? mins?

Each battle (or challenge as you're calling them) lasts 24 hours (with the exception of battle 2 and 7, which last 48 hours and 72 hours respectively), from midnight of one day to midnight of the next. The Dropbear of Doom has already been defeated, however you can still earn points towards your personal tally while waiting for the next battle to start. The next battle will start at midnight (45-50 minutes from when I'm posting this) and will then transition to bonus points on the Howling Abyss (ARAM).

For the next challenge, you'll need to earn a total of 4 points (across all battles) to get the Hextech Chest and Key that are up for grabs.

If you mean which game mode you need to play to contribute points, you can play any mode as long as it isn't "Coop VS AI" or "Custom", so basically any match made game. If you want bonus points, then you would need to play a mode that corresponds with the current "bonus point" map (Summoners Rift for Friday-Sunday, Howling Abyss for Monday-Tuesday and Twisted Treeline on Wednesday-Thursday). Keep in mind you only get points for wins.
